answerText: Prince Georgy Lvov[10] Lvov, in turn, deferred to this man, who, after serving as Prime Minister, had to escape by dressing up as a sailor. He ordered Brusilov's July Offensive and was the target of a failed coup by Lavr Kornilov.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Chicago A  | 21 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Vladimir Lenin rather mockingly praised this man's comments about a "deep breach" during World War One. For 10 points each: [10] Name this head of the Provisional Government directly following the tsar's abdication.
